data.lyric:
[ti:Eyes On You]
[ar:Chase Rice]
[al:Lambs & Lions]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Eyes On You - Chase Rice
[00:10.54]We've been to both Carolina's
[00:13.07]Seen a big Montana sky
[00:15.45]Driven up and down the coast a few times
[00:17.59]
[00:18.14]London Paris paradise
[00:20.38]But ain't got much memory of the scenes come to think
[00:24.30]I miss them all every damn time
[00:27.23]It's all your fault
[00:29.97]No matter where we go
[00:32.19]No matter what we do
[00:34.41]If you're there girl I've got my eyes on you
[00:39.66]Don't matter where we've been
[00:41.81]No there ain't no better view
[00:44.26]Than you in my arms with my eyes on you
[00:49.15]With my eyes on you
[00:52.30]
[00:54.06]With my eyes on you
[00:57.29]
[01:00.06]Speaking of the coast remember Pfeiffer beach
[01:02.36]You and me that sunset cliffs by the sea
[01:05.64]And the night rolled in
[01:07.28]And you still talk about that moon that I can't recall
[01:11.20]But God I saw
[01:12.85]
[01:13.78]All I needed too
[01:14.86]
[01:16.18]Might as well have stayed in the room
[01:19.37]No matter where we go
[01:21.77]No matter what we do
[01:23.80]If you're there girl I've got my eyes on you
[01:29.05]Don't matter where we've been
[01:31.29]No there ain't no better view
[01:33.68]Than you in my arms with my eyes on you
[01:38.63]With my eyes on you
[01:42.09]
[01:43.54]With my eyes on you
[01:46.74]
[01:49.57]Don't you remember Times Square
[01:51.17]
[01:51.83]And people counting down everywhere
[01:53.83]2000-whatever no I didn't care
[01:56.41]
[01:57.45]Cause baby you were there
[01:58.73]
[01:59.58]And once again
[02:01.22]Couldn't help but stare
[02:03.86]No matter where we go
[02:06.25]No matter what we do
[02:08.35]If you're there girl I've got my eyes on you
[02:13.46]Don't matter where we've been
[02:15.77]No there ain't no better view
[02:18.23]Than you in my arms with my eyes on you
[02:23.55]Halfway around the world
[02:25.71]Or the local corner booth
[02:28.09]Yeah you guessed it girl
[02:29.82]You know I got my eyes on you
[02:33.35]We could be on any street
[02:35.55]Any party any room
[02:38.03]I'll be there all night with my eyes on you
[02:43.32]Don't matter where we've been
[02:45.38]No there ain't no better view
[02:47.89]Than you in my arms with my eyes on you
data.trans:
[ti:Eyes On You]
[ar:Chase Rice]
[al:Lambs & Lions]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:10.54]我们去过南北卡罗来纳州
[00:13.07]见过蒙大拿州广阔的天空
[00:15.45]驱车游览过几次海边景色
[00:17.59]
[00:18.14]伦敦 巴黎 天堂 都去过
[00:20.38]但现在我已经记不清当时的景色了
[00:24.30]我好怀念
[00:27.23]都是你的错
[00:29.97]不管我们去哪里
[00:32.19]不管我们做什么
[00:34.41]只要有你在 我就会凝望着你
[00:39.66]不管我们去过哪里
[00:41.81]再美的景色都不如
[00:44.26]你躺在我的怀里 我深情凝望着你
[00:49.15]我深情凝望着你
[00:52.30]
[00:54.06]我深情凝望着你
[00:57.29]
[01:00.06]说到海边 你记得菲佛海滩吗
[01:02.36]你和我在海边悬崖上一起看日落
[01:05.64]夜幕慢慢降临
[01:07.28]你现在还常常提起那天的月亮 我却已经记不清了
[01:11.20]但是我知道
[01:12.85]
[01:13.78]自己需要什么
[01:14.86]
[01:16.18]还不如待在家里不出去
[01:19.37]不管我们去哪里
[01:21.77]不管我们做什么
[01:23.80]只要有你在 我就会凝望着你
[01:29.05]不管我们去过哪里
[01:31.29]再美的景色都不如
[01:33.68]你躺在我的怀里 我深情凝望着你
[01:38.63]我深情凝望着你
[01:42.09]
[01:43.54]我深情凝望着你
[01:46.74]
[01:49.57]你记得时代广场吗
[01:51.17]
[01:51.83]大家一起倒数跨年
[01:53.83]那是2000年吧 无所谓 我不在乎
[01:56.41]
[01:57.45]因为当时我的眼里只有你
[01:58.73]
[01:59.58]又一次
[02:01.22]忍不住凝望着你
[02:03.86]不管我们去哪里
[02:06.25]不管我们做什么
[02:08.35]只要有你在 我就会凝望着你
[02:13.46]不管我们去过哪里
[02:15.77]再美的景色都不如
[02:18.23]你躺在我的怀里 我深情凝望着你
[02:23.55]走遍了半个世界
[02:25.71]最后回到自己的小窝
[02:28.09]你猜到了 姑娘
[02:29.82]你知道我在看你
[02:33.35]不管在哪一条街道
[02:35.55]哪一个派对 哪一间屋子
[02:38.03]我都会与你彻夜相伴 深情凝望着你
[02:43.32]不管我们去过哪里
[02:45.38]再美的景色都不如
[02:47.89]你躺在我的怀里 我深情凝望着你
